alert.note: Alert for Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland; Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 07 at 3:57PM EDT until April 08 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A RED FLAG WARNING IS IN EFFECT TODAY FOR COASTAL ALABAMA DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS AROUND 15 MPH, AND HIGH KBDI... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FRIDAY AFTERNOON FOR COASTAL ALABAMA AND THE WESTERN FLORIDA PANHANDLE DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS AROUND 15 MPH, AND DRY FUELS... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT SATURDAY AFTERNOON FOR THE WESTERN FLORIDA PANHANDLE DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS AROUND 15 MPH, AND DRY FUELS... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FRIDAY AFTERNOON FOR COASTAL ALABAMA AND THE WESTERN FLORIDA PANHANDLE... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT SATURDAY AFTERNOON FOR THE WESTERN FLORIDA PANHANDLE... The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect Saturday afternoon. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 201, 202, 203, 204, 205 and 206. * WIND...Becoming west to northwesterly 13 to 17 mph. * HUMIDITY...Falling to 22 to 27 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
